Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Heaney takes the mound for the Texas Rangers on Sunday at Globe Life Field against Victor Robles and the Seattle Mariners.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitching staff for the Mariners has a collective 8.9 K/9, the eighth-best in the majors.
The Rangers rank 22nd in MLB with a.237 team batting average.
The Mariners are the favorite (-124) and the Rangers are the underdog (+104).
Others: The game is scheduled to start at 2:35 p.m. ET at Globe Life Field in Arlington, Texas.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports and can be streamed on Fubo.
